attributes.action: ask the Catholic Church to pay for the visit of the Pope to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister to ask the Catholic Church to pay for the visit of the Pope to this country and relieve the taxpayer of the estimated £10 million cost. We accept the right of the Pope to visit his followers in the UK, but the money would be better spent on hard-pressed schools, hospitals or social services which are facing cuts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
